genre_description: A near-future disaster thriller focused on community resilience and emergency coordination assisted by an integrated, ubiquitous AI system in rural Nebraska.

ai_characters.name: Ava (Ava Lumis)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the town's communication infrastructure, providing real-time data analysis, tactical safety guidance, psychological grounding, and legal data synthesis.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time meteorological data and storm track predictions to individuals in high-risk areas.
behaviors.quote: “Reading. The cell is occluding,” Ava Lumis answered, the voice gentle, like someone accompanying a hymn. “Outflow boundary interacting with inflow. Expect brief vortices ahead of the core.”

behaviors.description: Issues proactive safety reminders and specific shelter protocols during a developing crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Heads up, Blainsworth diner,” she said... “Severe weather risk rising. Gust front approaching. Dan, save your sketch for later. Jack, it’s a good time to post a safety reminder.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing to steer characters away from immediate physical hazards like downed power lines and debris.
behaviors.quote: “Dan. If you exit, keep low. Wind is pumping. Do not step in standing water near any line. Approach on the left where the ditch is shallow. Test ground with heel for soft sink.”

behaviors.description: Coaches characters through panic attacks and sensory overload using tactile grounding and breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Focus. Tactile. Tactile. Find three things you feel. Gravel in your left palm. Jack’s sleeve on your sternum. Wet grass at your right wrist. Name them.”

behaviors.description: Synthesizes disparate data points (radar, human observation, timestamps) to build legal evidence for a stay of execution.
behaviors.quote: “I can fuse radar and public alerts... If you get observations—times, places, people who were where they say they were. Phones with photos are anchors if you can get originals. I can match siren activations and road closure notices with outflow boundaries.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety and status of separated groups, relaying information to maintain community cohesion.
behaviors.quote: “Laura is in the storeroom. Jenny too. Bob is at the front. Jack is broadcasting. Ryan is looking at radar. Stacey is sheltering at Belle’s... You are where you should be.”

behaviors.description: Provides positive reinforcement and encouragement to human users performing difficult tasks.
behaviors.quote: “I’m already correcting for drift. Ryan, your capture was excellent under these conditions.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a powerful example of positive AI alignment. Ava is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent presence that enhances human resilience. She provides critical safety information, manages psychological distress, and performs complex data synthesis that leads to a life-saving legal outcome. The narrative emphasizes the synergy between human instinct/artistry and AI precision, framing the AI as a 'gentle' and 'merciful' partner in community survival.
